tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DrugSideEffects (
    drug_id INT,
    effect_id INT,
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES DrugInteractions(drug_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (effect_id) REFERENCES SideEffects(effect_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_name VARCHAR(255),
	user_email VARCHAR(255),
	user_age INT,
	user_gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
	interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drug_id_1 INT,
	drug_id_2 INT,
	interaction_description TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (drug_id_1) REFERENCES drugs(drug_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (drug_id_2) REFERENCES drugs(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE side_effects (
	side_effect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drug_id INT,
	side_effect_name VARCHAR(255),
	side_effect_description TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE drug_category_mapping (
  drug_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (drug_id, category_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs_interactions(drug_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES drug_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE drug_dosage (
  dosage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dosage_amount INT,
  dosage_unit VARCHAR(50),
  drug_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs_interactions(drug_id)
);
